keyHabits.title: Suggestions: Key Habits to Start Your Day
keyHabits.hydrate.title: Hydrate upon waking
keyHabits.hydrate.why: The body loses fluids overnight; drinking water helps reactivate metabolism and improve concentration.
keyHabits.hydrate.action: Drink a large glass of water before coffee or breakfast.
keyHabits.move.title: Physical movement (light exercise or stretching)
keyHabits.move.why: The body needs to activate after hours of rest. Movement improves circulation and oxygenates the brain.
keyHabits.move.action: 5â€“10 minutes of stretching, gentle yoga, or a short walk.
keyHabits.move.benefit: Reduced muscle stiffness and increased vitality.
keyHabits.calm.title: Mental calm (meditation or conscious breathing)
keyHabits.calm.why: The mind is often scattered upon waking; meditation helps center thoughts and reduce stress.
keyHabits.calm.action: Spend 5 minutes breathing deeply or practicing mindfulness.
keyHabits.calm.benefit: Greater mental clarity and a better emotional disposition for the day.
